name: Harambe Respect Simulator *TRIGGER WARNING DAT BOI*
name_original: Harambe Respect Simulator *TRIGGER WARNING DAT BOI*
description:
Pay respect to Harambe.

An incredible journey of meme's and loss as grief over the death of Harambe fills your soul.

- 4 different emoji

- Chance to encounter dat boi

- Hours of family friendly entertainment

"10/10 - but dont send me this game again" - Anonymous

"9/10 - Harambe will forever live in our hearts, but also this game" - IGN*

(*Quote actually may or may not be not from IGN)
